publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-3642 Christina McKelvie: Well Done Motherwell College—That the Parliament congratulates Motherwell College on becoming the first and only state-funded education establishment in Scotland to be authorised to deliver the International Baccalaureate Diploma course and looks forward to seeing the teaching for this qualification delivered at the new £70 million campus at Ravenscraig.
S3M-3642 Well Done Motherwell College (lodged on 9 March 2009) Jamie Hepburn*

S3M-3642 Christina McKelvie: Well Done Motherwell College—That the Parliament congratulates Motherwell College on becoming the first and only state-funded education establishment in Scotland to be authorised to deliver the International Baccalaureate Diploma course and looks forward to seeing the teaching for this qualification delivered at the new £70 million campus at Ravenscraig. Supported by: Jamie Hepburn, Rob Gibson*, Robin Harper*, Alasdair Allan*, Kenneth Gibson*, Shirley-Anne Somerville*, Bob Doris*
S3M-3642 Well Done Motherwell College (lodged on 9 March 2009) Hugh O’Donnell*, Angela Constance*, Margaret Mitchell*
S3M-3642 Well Done Motherwell College (lodged on 9 March 2009) Tom McCabe*
S3M-3642 Well Done Motherwell College (lodged on 9 March 2009) Gil Paterson*, Bill Kidd*
S3M-3642 Well Done Motherwell College (lodged on 9 March 2009) Stuart McMillan*
